content:
🚀 audiblez | Python
🎯 Primary Use Case: Converting ebooks to audiobooks
✨ Key Features: • Generates .m4b audiobooks from .epub ebooks using Kokoro's text-to-speech model • Supports multiple languages (🇺🇸 🇬🇧 🇪🇸 🇫🇷 🇮🇳 🇮🇹 🇯🇵 🇧🇷 🇨🇳) • Offers both command-line and GUI interfaces • Provides CUDA support for GPU acceleration • Allows adjusting audio speed (0.5x to 2.0x)
📖 Summary: Audiblez converts ebooks (.epub) into audiobooks (.m4b) using Kokoro's text-to-speech model. It offers command-line and GUI interfaces, supports multiple languages and CUDA acceleration, and allows for speed adjustment. The process involves generating individual chapter WAV files and then combining them into a final M4B file using ffmpeg.
🔗 Links: • View Project ================ 🔓 Open Source
